Habakkuks prayer applyed to the churches present occasions, on Hab. 3. 2. And Christs counsel to the church of Philadelphia, on Rev. 3. 11. / Preached before the provincial assembly of London. By that late reverend and faithful minister of Jesus Christ Mr. Samuel Balmford, pastor of Albons Woodstreet. Balmford, Samuel, d. 1659?
[14], 109, [1] p.
Printed by E.M. for Adroniram Byfield at the three Bibles in Corn-hil neer Popeshead-Alley., London, : 1659.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "June". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
